Comment: The game will start very basic, the moves are the most common moves on the chess game database.
This is my usual game opening with white though I'm thinking of playing  1d4 some more because I'm not known to that opening.
This is pretty standard. Black could play Nxe4 here. The most standard move is Bc5 here. H6 is possible too.
This is pretty standard. Black could play Nxe4 here. The most standard move is Bc5 here. H6 is possible too.
This is pretty standard. Black could play Nxe4 here. The most standard move is Bc5 here. H6 is possible too.
This move isn't really standard, but it's not really that bad. However after Ng5 black should play d5, so this may be counted as losing a tempo.
Here I go trying to get some fun. d5 is pretty standard here but black had a surprising move that lost immediately.
This move looks ok, but it is not! Nxf7 looks good, probably Qf6 will follow and there will probably be some material loss for black. However there is a better move.
Bxf7+ this will go into a forced mate!
The player probably thought kd7 would lose the knight. However he is in a worse situation right now.
And so this will result in
checkmate in 8. I was happy I saw it.
